title: card.random Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing random number or random data generated by the Notecard's hardware random number generator.

count.description: A random number generated by the Notecard's onboard hardware random number generator.

payload.description: If using `"mode":"payload"`, a base64-encoded string with random values, the length of which is specified by the `count` argument.

samples.title: Random Number Response
samples.description: Example response with a random integer.

samples.title: Random Payload Response
samples.description: Example response with base64-encoded random data.
